 10#ifndef VSIP_CORE_PARALLEL_SCALAR_BLOCK_MAP_HPP
 11#define VSIP_CORE_PARALLEL_SCALAR_BLOCK_MAP_HPP
 12
 13/***********************************************************************
 14  Included Files
 15***********************************************************************/
 16
 17#include <vsip/core/vector_iterator.hpp>
 18#include <vsip/core/parallel/map_traits.hpp>
 19#include <vsip/core/map_fwd.hpp>
 20
 21
 22
 23/***********************************************************************
 24  Declarations
 25***********************************************************************/
 26
 27namespace vsip
 28{
 29
 30namespace impl
 31{
 32
 33/// Scalar_block_map class for Scalar_block.
 34
 35/// Similar to Local_or_global_map, but with fixed size.
 36
 37template <dimension_type Dim>
 38class Scalar_block_map
 39{
 40  // Compile-time typedefs.
 41public:
 42  typedef impl::Vector_iterator<Vector<processor_type> > processor_iterator;
 43  typedef impl::Communicator::pvec_type impl_pvec_type;
 44
 45  // Constructor.
 46public:
 47  Scalar_block_map() {}
 48
 49  ~Scalar_block_map() {}
 50
 51  // Accessors.
 52public:
 53  // Information on individual distributions.
 54  distribution_type distribution     (dimension_type) const VSIP_NOTHROW
 55    { return whole; }
 56  length_type       num_subblocks    (dimension_type) const VSIP_NOTHROW
 57    { return 1; }
 58  length_type       cyclic_contiguity(dimension_type) const VSIP_NOTHROW
 59    { return 0; }
 60
 61  length_type num_subblocks()  const VSIP_NOTHROW { return 1; }
 62  length_type num_processors() const VSIP_NOTHROW
 63    { return vsip::num_processors(); }
 64
 65  index_type subblock(processor_type /*pr*/) const VSIP_NOTHROW
 66    { return 0; }
 67  index_type subblock() const VSIP_NOTHROW
 68    { return 0; }
 69
 70  processor_iterator processor_begin(index_type sb) const VSIP_NOTHROW
 71  {
 72    assert(sb == 0);
 73    return processor_iterator(vsip::processor_set(), 0);
 74  }
 75
 76  processor_iterator processor_end  (index_type sb) const VSIP_NOTHROW
 77  {
 78    assert(sb == 0);
 79    return processor_iterator(vsip::processor_set(), vsip::num_processors());
 80  }
 81
 82  const_Vector<processor_type> processor_set() const
 83    { return vsip::processor_set(); }
 84
 85  // Applied map functions.
 86public:
 87  length_type impl_num_patches(index_type sb) const VSIP_NOTHROW
 88    { assert(sb == 0); return 1; }
 89
 90  void impl_apply(Domain<Dim> const& /*dom*/) VSIP_NOTHROW
 91    {}
 92
 93  template <dimension_type Dim2>
 94  Domain<Dim2> impl_subblock_domain(index_type sb) const VSIP_NOTHROW
 95    { assert(sb == 0); return Domain<Dim>(); }
 96
 97  template <dimension_type Dim2>
 98  impl::Length<Dim2> impl_subblock_extent(index_type sb) const VSIP_NOTHROW
 99    { assert(sb == 0); return impl::extent(Domain<Dim>()); }
100
101  template <dimension_type Dim2>
102  Domain<Dim2> impl_global_domain(index_type sb, index_type patch)
103    const VSIP_NOTHROW
104    { assert(sb == 0 && patch == 0); return Domain<Dim>(); }
105
106  template <dimension_type Dim2>
107  Domain<Dim2> impl_local_domain (index_type sb, index_type patch)
108    const VSIP_NOTHROW
109    { assert(sb == 0 && patch == 0); return Domain<Dim>(); }
110
111  index_type impl_global_from_local_index(dimension_type /*d*/, index_type sb,
112				     index_type idx)
113    const VSIP_NOTHROW
114  { assert(sb == 0); return idx; }
115
116  index_type impl_local_from_global_index(dimension_type /*d*/, index_type idx)
117    const VSIP_NOTHROW
118  { return idx; }
119
120  template <dimension_type Dim2>
121  index_type impl_subblock_from_global_index(Index<Dim2> const& /*idx*/)
122    const VSIP_NOTHROW
123  { return 0; }
124
125  template <dimension_type Dim2>
126  Domain<Dim> impl_local_from_global_domain(index_type /*sb*/,
127					    Domain<Dim2> const& dom)
128    const VSIP_NOTHROW
129  {
130    VSIP_IMPL_STATIC_ASSERT(Dim == Dim2);
131    return dom;
132  }
133
134  // Extensions.
135public:
136  impl::par_ll_pset_type impl_ll_pset() const VSIP_NOTHROW
137    { return impl::default_communicator().impl_ll_pset(); }
138  impl::Communicator&    impl_comm() const
139    { return impl::default_communicator(); }
140  impl_pvec_type const&  impl_pvec() const
141    { return impl::default_communicator().pvec(); }
142
143  length_type            impl_working_size() const
144    { return this->num_processors(); }
145
146  processor_type         impl_proc_from_rank(index_type idx) const
147    { return this->impl_pvec()[idx]; }
148
149  index_type impl_rank_from_proc(processor_type pr) const
150  {
151    for (index_type i=0; i<this->num_processors(); ++i)
152      if (this->impl_pvec()[i] == pr) return i;
153    return no_rank;
154  }
155
156  // No member data.
157};
158
159
160
161/***********************************************************************
162  Map traits
163***********************************************************************/
164
165template <dimension_type Dim>
166struct Is_local_map<Scalar_block_map<Dim> >
167{ static bool const value = true; };
168
169template <dimension_type Dim>
170struct Is_global_map<Scalar_block_map<Dim> >
171{ static bool const value = true; };
172
173
174
175} // namespace vsip::impl
176} // namespace vsip
177
178#endif // VSIP_CORE_PARALLEL_SCALAR_BLOCK_MAP_HPP
